class personage.Bullet(*pos)¶

Bases: pygame.sprite.Sprite

This class defines a bullet.

image: object¶
A mobs image.
rect: object¶
The rect of bullet surface.
speed_y: int¶
The speed of vertical bullet moving.

This method defines bullet updating.


class personage.Mob(screen)¶

Bases: pygame.sprite.Sprite

This class defines a mob.

METHODS

Mob.update()

Mob.rotate()


ATTRIBUTES

image_orig: object¶
A mobs image.
image: object¶
A copy of image_orig (for image rotation).
rect: object¶
The rect of mob surface.
speed_x: int¶
The speed of horizontal mob  moving.
speed_y: int¶
The speed of vertical mob moving.
rot: int = 0¶
The initial rotation angle.
rot_speed: int¶
The angle of mob rotation.
last_update: int¶
Time of mob updating.

rotate()¶

This method defines mob rotation.


update(screen)¶

This method defines mob updating.

Param

object screen: The mob rendering screen.


class personage.Player(screen)¶

Bases: pygame.sprite.Sprite

This class defines the player.

METHODS

Player.update()

Player.shoot()

Player.hide()


ATTRIBUTES

image: object¶
The player image.
icon: object¶
The player icon.
rect: object¶
The rect of player surface.
speed_x: int = 8¶
The speed of horizontal player moving.
health: int = 100¶
The player health.
shoot_delay: int = 250¶
Delay between shots.
last_shot: int¶
Time of last shot.
lives: int = 3¶
Count of player lives.
hidden: bool = False¶
The flag of player hiding.
hide_timer: int¶
Time of last player hiding.

hide()¶

This method defines player hiding.


shoot()¶

This method defines player shooting.

Param

object args: Groups of sprites, where a bullet will be added.


update(screen)¶

This method defines player updating.

Param

object screen: The player rendering screen.


personage.all_sprites = <Group(1 sprites)>¶

The group of all sprites.


personage.bullets = <Group(0 sprites)>¶

The group of all bullets.


personage.mobs = <Group(0 sprites)>¶

The group of mobs.


personage.new_mob(count)¶

Generating new instance of class Mob in personage module.

Param

count:Count to mobs generation.
